title: EPISTOLAE Erik Nappa
html:
EPISTOLAE Erik Nappa

I overheard an elderly (old) man (such as myself) reply to the polite question, “How are you?” with, “I'm still on the green side of the grass.”

I had never heard this expression before and am wondering whether it is familiar or was possibly coined by him.

[Erik Nappa, Brick, New Jersey]
